feed.title: Radarr Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Radarr: 5.2.6.8376
entry.content:
To receive further Pre-Release or final updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Radarr within an existing docker container.

Changes:

  • bdc4aade0f4a9f5acf43c9b808d79b41226141b6 Use extra release fields in PassThePopcorn parser
  • b2300dbf416ae73cd07d22e1d9bbb8eb5ce8ba49 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • 44289d30f9a4e89fa8b8ef87e7913c0d91d42d8f Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • 260fb88f859c39644642669f4622161f7310d7e0 Fix various typos
  • 119cdf6f09440df1b4dc12d65efd07bb88ce425a Fixed: Cleanup orphaned import list movies by movie metadata
  • c8d30fd2146becfcdb1dd7407be4b16e5c20ceff Cleanup convert root folders to TS
  • 7e9e528d3bbbb77ab1260a25f77dc45dd1bf18af Fixed: Ignore empty tags when adding items to Flood [ #8145 ]
  • 8554c0d9cb18d9fcb0b5498462a1d2bb065df4a6 Refactor movie alternative titles connector
  • 22cc34b4fe71df99ae78ab4fca11a50e47ee07a1 Bump version to 5.2.6
  • 990785ebfc2424982ba40b5196066bf9e88b90af Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
See More * 957be9940134a1f822bbc8a375d67c8e844090de Fixed: Bump media info revision for DV HDR10Plus * 4bcde25e2916ef7727a2f2d7e481501653acc856 Improve messaging for accepted Custom Formats scoring upgrades [ #9496 ] * 1d70f36e7d33c58b0782731da0d3b7c58e5bbacb New: 3D and HDR metadata for Trakt connection * cc0a448bc8f3e0f46bed30f5875d018f90dc3544 New: Rate limiting for Trakt connection * c9e977baeaaf95710e687bac75bfa83e984e654c Simplify mapping in Trakt connection * 6cb9a46cd40fda84f9ba8bc1aa2d55fda7b6bffe Fixed: Imported movies updating on Calendar [ #9491 ] * eef379277a089e73327f5b6fca2943403dd44554 Enable browser navigation buttons for PWA [ #9487 ] * 41fef47684b8b179a730b4ca3b18d61768c16867 New: Support for DV HDR10Plus from media info * fcda6faf3d33b506ca6c953c25b96f0a07b767b2 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * 79bbf9c50ba4b0c2efa3abd37ba833ad9f2d29fb Fixed: Movie status label in add movie search results * #9478 ] * 229d91fe4024f983103202bfa2217f4fd0f17f59 Implement DatabaseConnectionInfo * 2673d1eee4b5b2054ac0c5a394f056f3b37a0eba Fixed: Movie poster in search results after adding [ #8029 ] * e59fd1118f35420778d6368737964fd604ece949 Fixed: Downloading status post-adding movie * c1fd33b152868eebf4b27108e6cf70c487c9481a Fix categories for NZBFinder * 2f58c8676fbd0964a1bb09deed79528717d934c9 Bump dotnet to 6.0.25 * defc448304f5ede86f860ca00da6dee2b64baf5b Update NZBFinder categories and remove OZnzb & NZB-Tortuga from default definitions (#9474) * 3ec335872898e87a82c39d671b2bbb2b5e30d711 Bump version to 5.2.5 * d4072cdfe23b5751d8c463cfb7c1d82f76440802 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * 136a030c079874c13be1086a2368f6566fb5160d Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * 6d89ae89a46d35c2b04275e22f5b4066edfd1a06 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * 98e4273b7af04122d69f021738ef43fdd01f80f1 Automated API Docs update * ecf9983ea618ab81dba80db78db9c77f114c1d5c Fix minimum availability label in movie table row * a059a700ebdeca46a6c006b659ea29695d9864fa New: Minimum Availability in bulk manage import lists [ #9461 ] * ced624c2ff87702685d24890847a4379a0b0341b Small helper in UI to access Radarr API more easily * 7c32061e171e4a73fc08da7afd34c5657471483a Add existing flag for Discover Movie Posters * bc4847cdc7fb12637f3599c3693d1e9f1476b91a New: Improve fields selection for Discord connection * 65d79dd078d2dd95e256aea5116694cb63853cb3 Fixed: Progress bar for collection movies in queue * 238ddbbe1f3c4b0529d5772e286b0b4b8d7f25e7 Fixed: Improve Required Flags selection for indexers * 3f444406da0649ee7b0dc8410eebefe4b28c0860 Fixed: (PassThePopcorn) Support for half leech releases * d7aaa1cdc2fc48f841866b20d7e4c70c42536c4c Fixed: Cleanup orphaned movies * 263534717dd7bb6a8c3b87d8dec239a84b33d3b1 Always validate Custom Script path * 073d15160d259a30d00c448181e76cca7d9995a2 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * c5075e5d49e8bf72f647f28653c346997546887a Fixed Custom Format Deletion confirmation message [ #9410 ] * fc345047ee389d1c661f623f3042c88a261a2c4b Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * bffab87da75788044a9adc56e8ab549331396279 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * a8a9d3b833bc295905b8be896c555cfa4462b327 Bump version to 5.2.4 * ff1987be848b895e3ca23402fcaa8ba5d082e321 New: Remove defunct Boxcar notifications [ #9451 ] * cb08c0767d63547c2568efcbbd4ed36780b289e5 Switch assignment to operator * 5f1d7ddc11c78da7fca251b77d5a60432c27fb72 Improve discover movies sorting by release dates * 0ba3c08ea69c6b7aa8773a1a701a3444c3577fa8 Small UI fixes to discover movies * 6b9a378eafec2d623d195ea888f9a0a810afafe5 Fixed: Minimum refresh interval for import list presets * b4562e62365f50f3eabf37ed817c9d2353da6b74 Fixed: Movie grabbed history on interactive search * bbffff78ed2c1a65c8050e16b0307becff996571 Fixed: Disable swipe on movie details when a modal is open * 740f0f1e5fbd4be680ce4789a8417b7719fcdf25 Cleanup unused logic in Movie Details * 45b38b44c1ed2108422a25770c6cc77d0f0c39d5 Fixed: Interactive search modal on mobile * 318d59bb9982c56a8a121f5be7067bd328203282 Fixed force saving provider triggering testing * ed54d071c41d66d8a7e97841f7bed8c83f4b9184 Fixed: Wrap long lines in media info popup * * 8e0645670bca02b20efa3f284c935909118ebc68 New: Rework Movie Details view * 40eeb31a219b1cff450bd45aaaa886e10393960f New: Move Interactive search to toolbar * 3e534cf8bfdc7e831e9add81cb958f49469d570a Bump version to 5.2.3 * c96b3c4b0bbfb62938c2b64235f99fb6cc0b1e73 Fixed: Autotagging Genres are case insensitive [ #9436 ] * 78bc9f9b4bd636f39d8d828dbea30b2381acdf3c Fixed: Saving indexer, download client, etc settings * b737f05a83645972d0e23bc8a2b1b5dceae91761 Automated API Docs update * 8d96fd2387de8bd350e6ced9af7e95bbd370fef8 More cleanup appName tokens * 6c487ead0079a6c84c99e3cffff3b321ae78c382 Fixed: Disable SSL when using the removed SslCertHash configuration (#9426) * 22e3cf844cd7e7d3adef8c32f3d44b59c1257fe8 New: Confirmation before clearing blocklist [ #9429, #9401 ] * 14b4b5e12276b47b03547a6bcbd15adcf68b3d9b Cleanup appName tokens [ #9430 ] * 10f5f3c5c8af24900aeaa593152afa66274469e3 New: Require password confirmation when setting or changing password * c687b552f0d554730cda47e3b8dbcd53a7aff417 Bump version to 5.2.2 * 92c8c8a7f5a0141109753c421e6d3c27f3eca75e Translate System pages [ #8852 ] * variable for App name in translations * f86060eca2e3da69b7e9b58494ef3d8ce14a5fdf Don't retest unchanged providers [ #9411, #9397 ] * bf9a0b62f2295c843db02f582f84434c87383a78 Rename 'ReturnUrl' to 'returnUrl' for forms auth redirection * ccc62f045099736ff4fdc3195d0848092a0d0701 Fixed: Enforce validation warnings when testing providers * 524657ad78fd0119457ad85da42179aab7eb80b8 Improve sample detection logging (#9405) * 7a394ff864cfbb32d31824f17634e295fd9a718a Update menu background on dark theme * d8862eedd354c17d21a92f5add5e39f3a0e2dab4 Fixed: Refresh discovery movies state on refresh lists * 71f700e240489bd37a12766538cc6535b1ffc715 Fixed: (HDBits) Add labels for categories, codecs and mediums * ae5dd84e0a4484830b590a7dc495ba1dfe2b97fa Fixed: (HDBits) Increase search limit to 100 releases * 17b398cf6244ec948e4da65cbfcfbe32a21a21bd Bump version to 5.2.1 * d00678c1ba55527b5bc16cccc6bb9c906bb23e1b Bump ffprobe to 5.1.4 * 03df9b7f07a7ce5447444c85b8aaba6cc4b9f40b Add troubleshooting link when movie searches fail * 3442a0ecca5d09b50321f2a8509723c836dc1b1e Bump version to 5.2.0 * 3376a467ca5d0a25d64d62462c54e339c58a894e Fixed: Record status for notifications on tests * 1650ce17fb286eff2e09154b06615a0370e634f1 Automated API Docs update * 2f2004faa2c7fe8872f089460d71edc20b8d8bf2 New: Resolve download client by name using 'downloadClient' for pushed releases * 437e2f45971e45089ec66433043158f516c2ac9e Don't store successful results for invalid providers * 17b8605751cb0ce5c0b690a49b75cadbbb9d080e Simply queue item for movie details page * b2a52e52b6b3b1e9b857fb409daac985d6b12e26 Fixed: (UI) Progress bar status for searching existing movies * 0f5fabdfcd0966618a6eb8d0630ad5dd0226732b Automated API Docs update * 6362ee9b7d9f178c2893bf13c8c3b0332daca45b Fixed: (UI) Import Lists enabled status doesn't rely on automatic add [ #9375 ] * 50465fd482e6650c6159fd59d69bd554cfdc7ec1 New: Add enabled to manage import lists bulk * 54d447d55f2440a1f738f79e01f3ca34ff0af29a New: Parse `VIE` as Vietnamese language * 50f48277e50657cc53e095d61dae0566e5cdd3d4 Don't show already imported movies as downloading in Movies index * c2e206b7ac4de272e23356c207e151baccefbe1a Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * 7a46de602f8392380cfd84fd9cc0005321517ee2 Increase the wait timeout for integration tests init * 89820c1ff743ee3789467a40758b9acb1c90f2ea Lower log level for missing translation/culture resource (#8956) [ #8150 ] * 67e6e129ff0b5255a24927fe36fa0f7fd33d1a56 Fix event ids for history custom filters * b6001238e50146c7f4523c6e4b96f63c0912a550 Sort root folders by path in UI [ #9280 ] * 7bbdcc81bb68bf4f46ea1103cb39a34a53bc7509 Use Diacritical.Net library for TitleFirstCharacter token [ #9324 ] * 3e8cbc497e62f8ae4fb1fdfe76f9a50d3f9d0a89 Fixed: Cleanup First Character in Title when using 'TitleFirstCharacter' [ #9249 ] * 60d2df043b6aaf054d3fa466ce970f7ff4614583 Rename instances of Profile to QualityProfile [ #9337 ] * da41cb8840403bea813ea92dfdffecce923e8cbc Fixed: Blocking unknown indexers from pushed releases * a4b7c99d91283987e69e9003657902a8dce057cf Fix full disk releases regex for a6dda70c0a5daa0a970d0caa32afc6d9010fd430 New: Add Download Client validation for indexers [ #9338 ] * e6fa14b1e6a6ff6fe10a0965e38650badb232d0b Allow 0 as valid value in QualityProfileExistsValidator * b5c0d515eed6090c21be183169f48b982d52c17d Improve UI notice for delayed queue items * b7aee25d0d6d06b28b45261526c6e6da40d7b59c Set proper default props for Queue details and status * 233b85aaf331b4973a9b4b0cb7315a2de3122fce Sort Custom Formats by name * 80db9a7dd45356757a5a7b649b7c47ee1082a967 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * 660d3d7643ac57d70c01c8644954cfff411ea73d Fixed: Don't reject DVDRip/DVDRemux as full DVD disk releases * d999aea36fa2653d84e75215cef474f50281d5d6 Add missing translation in release profiles * 5d45f1de894066014954c368b7866a689e9e37ee Update link to Docker instructions in readme (#9318) * 3e5089719c5504e745707d5305c5b23f928b2ca0 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * ec69dfaabb2c8aa45214b29af8f93fd5719d4dc6 Bump version to 5.1.2 * aa13a40bad46ba26da8cbf6db5451d8c29d3b20f Fixed: Update movie collection status in Radarr if removed on TMDB * 9b458812f1521848e526a930a72b43810e7f2d0f Fixed: Set Busy Timeout for SQLite * 1bdc48a8895c5360387050776977843a9c27c21d Revert "Bump SQLite to 3.42.0 (1.0.118)" * e5d479a162b5159bfc38aa6a32f40d89b433f9c8 Automated API Docs update * 9a50fcb82a333621c795b3a609fc28f42496b5f1 Sort movies by name in filter builder * f2357e0b60122c4b5e3e70573bec4494d7c57421 Fixed: Reduce font size for series title on series details [ #9301, #9302 ] * 0591d05c3bb6a50bfa1e8fdd5dbcfa05664d0f20 New: History custom filters [ #9298 ] * 299d50d56cae93ce9c279e2ad896ad29e1e0ef23 Cleanup Calendar custom filters [ #9296 ] * 7d3c01114b993588bc935511b7159cb27f6eea4e New: Queue custom filters [ #9297 ] * 70376af70b2eb48561780a39efb97dd8b116608c Fixed: Re-run Removed Movie health check after movie is deleted (#9277) * 9ef031bd9e08bd4aec281522198c9e153bd5a77f Fixed: Don't die when adding existing exclusions * 3a9b276c43b61e1b03e87744dcb95f57d51256c7 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * aabf209a07df119307c1d69996e4546dc61a4668 Bump version to 5.1.1 This list of changes was [auto generated](https://dev.azure.com/Radarr/961c82cf-1428-4ab0-9257-63be1671eac8/_release?releaseId=77&_a=release-summary).

entry.title: New release for Radarr: 5.3.6.8612
entry.content:
To receive further Pre-Release or final updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Radarr within an existing docker container.

Changes:

  • 63f16924b184ea069a623150821e498ec04115eb Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • a91a9f7fd9c7ab270b7992ed7e46fd8fb6fcae3b Fixed: Movie titles using default language after using movie editor
  • 4c8e9f204eb25bc6fd6c83351f667528cc652883 Fix movie queue status for download client unavailable
  • d64ee6681f0e05f9c7d6ebe3e9193f251fb28354 Fixed: Avoid upgrades for custom formats cut-off already met
  • 2ecc57cd318d7e6ab8d1d43605bb48fad832a45d Translations for Discover list
  • 9620207503126342b3bf099b835b4b658a5a0b31 Improve add/loading error notices [ #9767 ]
  • 0b090e5f3918b6397c299bc998e6b741d4c89ffc Improve Custom Format rejection messaging [ #9747 ]
  • 51cb0920ed77d7eeeb38397c41bed3cdb710b463 Fix translation token for DL client directory help text [ #9769 ]
  • a90d6682d3a63b6b4980909b9ed383a1e2f662ee Update Custom Format Deletion confirmation message [ #9766 ]
  • db62eddf5a8c817a4cf13cfff5a80730624d5697 Fixed: Allow selection of Cast/Crew names [ #9781 ]
See More * ac2b2e6215937d803c7aa2a618179426e841cdba Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * 9581dd9764023dfac10fd1c93fc2a364e29eb8e4 Show download client ID as hint in select options * 6c459c744a5a8a9a692ccedf138715892bfe5787 Improve messaging on indexer specified download client is not available * 4676ecfce9ff0bfe40b53ef88ea44d2c3afbdae0 Hints for week column and short dates in UI settings * ef92af9dd81c56a393c35a80b9fd9b9fc9c1e0be Fix translation for list exclusion on movie deletion * b144482d6833c9191ce773dbb7cf72776b4562af Bump version to 5.3.6 * 173b1d6a4c0f2125c4413c0c09b269d87a1f1ee8 Fixed: Align DownloadClientInfo in ManualInteractionRequiredMessage with DownloadMessage * 5f624a147bb62d37b731d9a0ae02bfd338793962 Automated API Docs update * af066da4ffaf33cf020574005e72590231476990 New: Ignore 'Other' subfolder when scanning disk [ #9718 ] * 937ebcdac37a59e6f464fefdbf54cf2a6d63f3bc New: Add RZeroX to release group parsing exceptions [ #9569, #9719 ] * 67f5199667ab581742c3a577d2f8274e20efcf87 Fixed: Parsing Hungarian anime releases [ #9673 ] * 38cd130da5519eacd933073dfd1b83277d8429c6 Fixed: Remove old naming config from API responses [ #9741 ] * ed340be2b15055c579fc50ac83b4cd68bb50b4d5 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * 34cfb58b396f112e131818f1fb9488ba757b8c74 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * 3d0f22ca7c5344964ffd5893c2d04b5ebf9aaf2c Fixed: Ignore invalid tags in CustomScript/Discord/Webhook * 2510f44c25bee6fede27d9fa2b9614176d12cb55 Fixed: Refresh tags state to clear removed tags by housekeeping * c0bf75cae3f62efae737a85e10c6c07bcf44f93b Fixed: Recommendations on Postgres * a63ab1ddd6f9345c81779ed04c76fc11ba29279b Fixed: Don't use sub folder to check for free disk space for update [ #9748 ] * 41cb020ff048c0a10fa1234e7376ec365743e7b5 New: Log database engine version on startup * d660309b5a2031ab8caedb1869f9f312977b4eeb Fixed: Redirecting after login * 222c19e4b34c55f0958d6575c1d15c421fe22d88 Fixed: Edit button for import list exclusion on mobile [ #9736 ] * b08981dee068e1ed23e4f45a0d8fe70ef7bf7703 Sort movie files on movie details page * 4a9c0b2240ebe53f759db4409c39dfa59efbaf70 Bump version to 5.3.5 * 8970b1276f38acd88ab89107a04461564b4649d1 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * e868dbf91127b9380d5264fd1cd7bdad326fe267 Fixed: Naming validation when using max token length * e38b31a2205fe07142efa91a527bb2840cc26f4c Fix table columns order for Interactive Search * 9b1dac4b5792369f0fa6b0b44afd2469c17c6c0a Tests for Movie Statistics [ #7891 ] * 20ac0bb0e150d8909cb009dce2c644874835b282 Avoid import loop for already imported movies [ #9325 ] * 9ffa1cc2b9ba6d2924760144ed6254def793f7fc Refactor select options in Manual Import [ #9613 ] * 422db874f079516ede8637c893d29657eb0fd7fa New: Accept ':##' on renaming tokens to allow specifying a maximum length for movie titles and release group [ #9713 ] * adf647f3e1cefdeb9669628f0d068cc854fd258f Automated API Docs update * dc81f51d40ad1ae4d95742d29581e524996df162 New: Search Movies on Add for bulk manage collections [ #8670 ] * c9da7ee0c9914dbdeb21886387e29e4280620199 New: Use Movie Folder Format to improve unmapped folders within root folders [ #8065 ] * 7198aa24a6cb6e7edf0b943aa7baac8dabfaf724 Refactor tags in WebhookMovie * 35c6fef2d146f08abbec65684d6a266b6f7c45ff Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * deac2bdf5c415a52f07b882387a1305ea5046cf5 New: Tags field for Notifiarr and Webhook * 8837473ed81885a31e073ee6f1d40542279c89ed Improve Release Grabbing & Failure Logging [ #9714 ] * 4ac538682d858a07c3ceb809972aae5633f5592a Fix ImportFixture test * 0277b2b2014f26827670eba9e5fd1e5e938510fa Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * e73015010e7d73fa01c44b8e49b75bbf5bd99061 New: Send 'On Manual Interaction Required' notifications in more cases [ #9722 ] * f704ab151267bd81b18798ede4e5c9ec875d8f4c Improve messaging if release is in queue because all movies in release were not imported * 2f1e077e0d03d08abe41c5db28475df09eeba92f Bind shortcut for pending changes confirmation only when it's shown * cd3397a7a1c72bc0c204d6f0af9ef54fb1420165 Use movie specific translation for quality limits message * b3517c14de40feee9867bf23fabaf504bebc13f6 New: Show error message for pending queue items without movies [ #8320 ] * 2d05708fa92b64500a48d1e26232f29b0fa482f6 Wrap external links tooltip in Movie Details * 2ca581f2b66f160f04886aa0eb7ffc919d770dff Translated using Weblate (Portuguese (Brazil)) [skip ci] * 8289b8978f992240c010b219882a54a1acd52258 Translated using Weblate (Hungarian) [skip ci] * 54c1f54b1334a85e1a53d7d2019e4598e996a171 Translated using Weblate (Finnish) [skip ci] * 918fcfd86ed039fe3d2bee8632a7bf860b2647f3 Translated using Weblate (Spanish) [skip ci] * f55206537cca0d8e6230edd2d8208f357ccafc25 Translated using Weblate (French) [skip ci] * d2d9ac8b9d00d55821382e98133eda3a8cbc4864 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * ca1a40723ba76e51028410faa458acb2e3395c22 Add Translations to Settings Pages * bfff736cfc8b9a52c55ed759e673d022c3cbaca4 Translations and some cleanup for extra files and movie editor tables * c2d28dd41b02b71821055302316aefc210837f3b Bump version to 5.3.4 * 0e8a1ca522da46a963acf13c832fe0aa2481bd29 Automated API Docs update * 1ba7bfe585ed912c25ca3de836e1f3d39ff67e78 Correctly show separator for Discovery Table view * 0be449033f271b81a2d3314d1d7ee110ac9727e4 New: Trending and Popular Movies in Discovery * 3b1d4460ada48b89e9397c55eb63c5613d8d685d Fixed: Only show recommendations based on library movies * 4eb4128a89d92a664b8f524cd535b069394f77eb Remove BOM from download clients * f90cdbb11210e6bd68f639abd069532d048a4ca9 Translate Download Clients on the backend [ #9391 ] * entry.title: New release for Radarr: 5.4.6.8723
entry.content:
To receive further Pre-Release or final updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Radarr within an existing docker container.

Changes:

  • f7ca0b8b0642bf4306341be41234f9317c154bad New: Auto tag movies based on tags present/absent on movies [ #9916 ]
  • 56be9502af7838b6215f87d29b89663e86d2e595 Add DevContainer, VSCode config and extensions.json [ #9914 ]
  • 77381d3f727cf2a7b12d994d7f5bd1413b0e08e6 New: Option to prefix app name on Telegram notification titles [ #9913 ]
  • 198e6324e064b339b4a72c1c880057e999412d2d Truncate long names for import lists
  • 81c9537e5a48e09c438134ea86204ce1f1c1f6c3 New: 'Custom Format:Format Name' rename token [ #9835, #9826 ]
  • d3cbb9be8dfdc7665805f8e832251141b33ab3f0 New: Detect shfs mounts
  • 2e043c0cf71496054815a672a0dea5cc092c8c1b Bump version to 5.4.6

This list of changes was auto generated.

entry.title: New release for Radarr: 5.5.3.8819
entry.content:
To receive further Pre-Release or final updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Radarr within an existing docker container.

Changes:

  • 685f462959e4e57e226b7fd902e7e0909d3d2a2c New: Include trending and popular options for Discover Movies
  • 7be8a3413031b48300701ddaaa68ed16bda7f169 Automated API Docs update
  • 886711b496a21c6145a29de2ef4f3f974488935f New: LanguageId filter added to all movie endpoint
  • 5185e037da5e8cba547e61f69a6b39fdb2c9db6d Automated API Docs update
  • 38e7e37d57f7affff8576ac3efcf340e0d2b7986 Refactor movie tags for CustomScript, Webhook and Notifiarr events [ #10003 ]
  • 190c4c5893d303b027cd38b49eca47330c84e793 New: Blocklist Custom Filters [ #9997 ]
  • 0ec18ce4b3a33dc86d26ae208438629fdae78626 New: Parse 480i Bluray/Remux as Bluray 480p [ #10010 ]
  • a08575b7bc499a7ff16357ffc66a36b5a0e3e349 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • 556cc885eca48cfc45b34722ed8f61011282886d Refactor PasswordInput to use type password
  • 586c0c6e1313cba8c9e778a85f0e4a89303d0cc5 Fixed: Notifications with only On Rename enabled
See More * cec569461d1b42a44406c943969030121d802723 Fixed: Text color for inputs on login page * 8b79b5afbf88cad2fa1bd5db5fdb14bf930feeae New: Dark theme for login screen [ #9998 ] * cd4552ce6f4715b5beb3754ecef437a3b063a7bd New: Support stoppedUP and stoppedDL states from qBittorrent [ #9995 ] * 256439304be392731e13cacb9997153d01ef0ce0 Use number input for seed ratio [ #10000 ] * bb44fbc362ebe7abc4c3934057ade51dd820f59c New: Root folder exists validation for import lists * cd401f72f55e4aca803561adee9cc58a15d54b66 Automated API Docs update * c9624e75501132aaae20a4c8380b4ab29e55f515 Fixed: Ignore invalid movie tags when writing XBMC metadata [ #9984 ] * 649702eaca58ca577c836c079917cb68f0876a0a Fixed: Indexer flags for torrent release pushes * 1c52f0f5bd64975bddf147f889448372e80944ee Automated API Docs update * dff85dc1f3e97f00a7e42234ddd99457c38e81f5 New: Display excluded label for movies in collections * 1090aeff7580622d894dcc2823a1e47a69f6135b Fixed: Ignore exclusions in missing movies for collections [ #9966 ] * 086a0addba6b794ac962e1e9d912bcff3dec8f9c New: Config file setting to disable log database (#9943) * 8b6cf34ce4ba96395b715ca2c110a21813807af0 Fixed: Parsing long downloading/seeding values from Transmission [ #9987 ] * 7f03a916f1ba011d25107d37a3fa6f83ccc679e9 New: Optionally use Environment Variables for settings in config.xml (#9985) * 3a6d603a9e02ebfde263e138e30281b91fc82384 Add file-count for Transmission RPC [ #9973 ] * cd2c7dc7fbe55a57dfa54f7a1f8a9b0ffd8fe1c6 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * f1d76c34837bcee2b320463d3d540947e2f1b326 Fix translations for SSL settings * 39eac4b5add38d602cc0319783fd3c89be779560 Add missing translation key * 71e1003358ddbbe5ecdedc4ca3d6d0781a5188c9 Forward X-Forwarded-Host header * 89b6a5d51f5f78240e5672d977f4f6f0ab605373 Bump version to 5.5.3 This list of changes was [auto generated](https://dev.azure.com/Radarr/961c82cf-1428-4ab0-9257-63be1671eac8/_release?releaseId=101&_a=release-summary).

entry.title: New release for Radarr: 5.6.0.8846
entry.content:
To receive further Pre-Release or final updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Radarr within an existing docker container.

Changes:

  • 077b041d3f49cc286f843cd65c7690b323c146e5 Fixed: Revert "Validate that folders in paths don't start or end with a space"
  • ff3dd3ae423a2cea0ded46ecd43f157e1afa813f Tests for Wanted pages
  • 2e3beddcbc6b26160f6469174c4d7ccd07e36303 Fixed: Sorting by movie titles in Missing/Cutoff Unmet under Postgres
  • dc068bbf3d12deb663a5131bb15ed676432b3cec Automated API Docs update
  • 7a303c1ebf732667ab74b9d6a23bdc7f8340b486 Remove not implemented endpoints from API docs
  • 152f50a1ef977298ef0415ccda6e84d83b37661b New: Wanted Cutoff/Missing
  • 97982025890910b13dbd271cde5dab3bbb8f0c19 Add missing translation for External
  • 7969776339602f88fcc0e379c0acbe98a67723e1 Rename file for getMovieStatusDetails
  • 288982d7bd6dc9cc160f3d3ab5c85ac4457b2ca7 Bump Npgsql to 7.0.7
  • d39a3ade5b637b6a9bfdec6d28552820a1008e0f Automated API Docs update
See More * 1fc6e88bc4652b6d225aecdd3338578c5ba537dd New: Add `isExisting` flag for movies in collections API * e8e1841e6c37ea6c694c969da09fc3e6c778ae8c New: No Release Dates availability message * d17eb4f33f0322659e130d365462108c4bb4ee1d Bump version to 5.6.0 This list of changes was [auto generated](https://dev.azure.com/Radarr/961c82cf-1428-4ab0-9257-63be1671eac8/_release?releaseId=102&_a=release-summary).
